Made with plant- and mineral-based ingredients, our All Purpose Cleaner is a worry-free way to get the surfaces in your home sparkling

Containing no cancer-causing chemicals, it’s safe for kitchens, kids, kittens — whatever you love!

Suitable for sensitive skin: dermatologically tested to minimize skin irritation.

Spray and wipe. It is advisable to test in an inconspicuous area.  If you are looking for a mindless cleaning solution, use ATTITUDE’s All-Purpose Cleaner. You may use this product to clean your house, car, barbecue, office, gym, yoga mat…/ Vaporisez et essuyez. Il est conseillé de tester dans une zone peu visible. Si vous recherchez une solution de nettoyage irréfléchie, utilisez le nettoyant tout usage d’ATTITUDE. Vous pouvez utiliser ce produit pour nettoyer votre maison, voiture, barbecue, bureau, salle de sport, tapis de yoga…
<5% Non-ionic surfactants (caprylyl glucoside, myristyl glucoside). Contains also : water, propanediol, sodium citrate, saponins, terpineol (citrus), decanal (citrus), allyl heptanoate (sweet fruit).

ATTITUDE Nature+Technology™ All Purpose Cleaner formula contains plant- and mineral- based ingredients like saponin, a natural cleansing agent, your entire house will be sparkling clean!

Did you know that some viruses can live up to seven days on household surfaces? In addition, studies have found that an average home can house over 340 different types of bacteria! Keep household germs away with ATTITUDE’s Nature + TechnologyTM All Purpose Cleaner Disinfectant 99.9% – Thyme & Citrus

At ATTITUDE, caring for the environment and reducing plastic is a priority, that’s why our Nature + Technology™ All Purpose Cleaner Disinfectant 99.9% – Thyme & Citrus and other products are now available in a simple and convenient eco-refill packaging!

Its worry-free and hypoallergenic formula is developed with plant- and mineral-based ingredients such as saponin for a natural way to clean your home!
Water, Caprylyl glucoside, Myristyl glucoside, Alcohol, Thyme extract, Fragrance, Dialkyl (50% C8-C10 25% C8 25% C10) (ACTIVE INGREDIENT), Dimethyl ammonium chloride (0.045%) (ACTIVE INGREDIENT)
Eco friendly household cleaners, health and beauty products and baby products.

They say flowers have therapeutic properties capable of healing the mind, body and soul. Liven up your laundry routine with ATTITUDE Nature + Technology™ Laundry Detergent – Wildflowers.

Hypoallergenic and dermatologically-tested: free of dyes, known allergens and irritants.

ECOLOGO Certified: sustainable and biodegradable product with low impact on health and the environment. PETA Certified: 100% vegan and cruelty-free.

Designed to work in High Efficiency (HE) and standard washing machines.

Voir le tableau pour les instructions de dosage. Pour les taches tenaces, versez une petite quantité directement sur la tache et frottez ou laissez tremper avant de laver. Vérifiez toujours les étiquettes pour des instructions spéciales. GARDER HORS DE LA PORTÉE DES ENFANTS

Liven up your laundry routine with ATTITUDE Nature + Technology™ Laundry Detergent – Wildflowers. ECOLOGO Certified and formulated with only natural and plant-derived ingredients like green tea extract, our hypoallergenic laundry detergent will keep your clothes smelling fresh and clean thanks to its advanced deodorizing formula. Plus, it’s biodegradable and sustainable, and contains no irritating enzymes – making it perfect for your family and the environment. Laundry away, worry-free!

Keep your kitchen sink and dishes spick and span with ATTITUDE Nature + TechnologyTM Dishwashing Liquid – Citrus Zest

Our unique formula is made with deep-cleansing and antibacterial agents like saponin, and uses natural, plant-based and hypoallergenic ingredients

PETA Certified: cruelty-free and 100% vegan.

Use 2 mL per liter of hot water, or approximately 15 mL for water in a standard sink. Not designed for automatic dishwashers.

Did you know many laundry detergents contain enzymes that digest the dirt right off your clothes? Unfortunately, these enzymes can also irritate your delicate skin.

ATTITUDE Nature + TechnologyTM Laundry Detergent – Unscented is ECOLOGO® Certified, sustainable and biodegradable and uses only natural and effective ingredients such as antibacterial green tea extract. Our laundry detergent is as gentle on your clothes as it is on your skin.

Hypoallergenic and tested by dermatologists: free of dyes, known allergens and skin-irritating ingredients.

FOR HARDWOOD SURFACES: Use diluted product only. Ideal for households with young kids and pets.

ATTITUDE Kids’ Toothpaste with Fluor is perfect for teaching your little ones healthy dental hygiene habits, thanks to its delicious, natural mango flavor.

This paraben-free and alcohol-free vegan toothpaste is made with plant and mineral ingredients. Since its formula contains fluoride sodium, this toothpaste helps prevent cavities and also protects your child's teeth from acid erosion when used regularly.

Our natural toothpaste helps rebuild fragile areas of the tooth and remineralize enamel.

Brush teeth thoroughly for at least 1 minute twice a day, preferably after each meal, or as directed by a dentist. Children under 6 years of age should use only a pea-sized amount and be supervised to brush properly and to not swallow. / Se brosser soigneusement les dents durant au moins une minute 2 fois par jour, de préférence après chaque repas, ou selon les directives d’un dentiste. Les enfants âgés de moins de 6 ans devraient utiliser une quantité de dentifrice équivalente à un pois. Un adulte devrait s’assurer de l’efficacité du brossage et vérifier que l’enfant n’avale pas le produit.

Inhalation (Respiratory System): Add 4 to 12 drops to a bowl of hot water or a diffuser. Inhale slowly and deeply for 5-10 minutes. / FR: L’huile essentielle de Géranium Rosat est utilisée en aromathérapie pour aider à soulager les tensions prémenstruelles et les symptômes de la ménopause, ainsi que pour aider à soulager le rhume et la toux. Topique (Adultes) : Mélanger 1 à 5 gouttes dans 1/2 cuillère à thé (2,5ml) d'huile végétale ; appliquer localement sur la partie affectée, 3 fois par jour.
Inhalation (Syst. respiratoire) : Ajouter 4 à 12 gouttes dans un bol d'eau chaude ou un diffuseur. Inhaler lentement et profondément pendant 5-10 minutes.

 The essential oil obtained by steam distilling its leaves is used in perfumery and in cosmetics

The word “thyme” comes from the Greek “thumos”, meaning “perfume”, referring to the pleasant scent released from the plant

 Thyme is a perfect example of a plant with different chemotypes

 Indeed, there are different types of thyme, depending on their chemical composition, resulting in chemically different essential oils with different properties

 This chemical composition is influenced by the specific growing environment and conditions of each variety (sun exposure, altitude, soil type, air quality)

A metaphor for love and beauty bearing an enormous variety of colours and scents, the rose embodies the passions of the heart

The Mandarin tree is a tree native to Southeastern Asia

 It is grown in Spain, Algeria, Tunisia, Morocco, Egypt and the United States

 Petit grain is the name given to the essential oil obtained by distilling the leaves of the Bitter Orange, Lemon or Mandarin tree

 Each tree results in three different essential oils, depending on how it is obtained: from the leaves (Petit Grain), the flower (Neroli) or the rind (fruit )

 Petit Grain is used in perfumery and in cologne

Parsley has been around for over 2,000 years and was considered a medicinal plant up until the Middle Ages

 Today, it is a very popular aromatic plant whose chopped leaves are used as a condiment to enhance the taste of crudit?s, salads, soups, sauces, as well as vegetable and meat dishes

 There are many varieties of parsley, the most common being curled or leafy parsley, flat leaf parsley and Italian parsley

 Its leaves are rich in vitamins A and C

Lemon Scented Myrtle (Backhousia citriodora) is a tree in the Myrtaceae family, native to the semi-temperate rain forests of Eastern Australia

 It owes its Latin name (Backhousia citriodora) to British botanist James Backhouse

 It is called lemon scented because its ground leaves have a strong lemony scent

 The oil extracted from it is used in cosmetics and in soaps, lotions and shampoos

 The leaves are used to add a lemony flavour to pasta, fish, aromatic oil, herbal tea, or lemon tea

 Its wood is used as lumber and engineered wood products (barns, flooring, furniture, etc

Traditionally used in phytotherapy to help relieve the pain and inflammation associated with bruising and swelling caused by injuries from falls or blunt force trauma

For women who are breastfeeding, do not apply to or near the nipples. Do not use if you are allergic to plants of the Asteraceae, Compositae, Daisies family.

Do not apply to wounds or damaged skin. Do not cover with a bandage. Do not apply with an external heat source, such as an electric heating pad; this could cause excessive irritation or burning of the skin.

Carrot beauty oil is regenerative and anti-aging. It helps prevent the signs of aging and promotes regeneration of the skin. Promotes a healthy-glow. Prickly Pear beauty oil is anti-aging and antioxidant.
Arnica oil extract is traditionally used in herbal medicine’s to help relieve pain and inflammation of muscles and joints (e.g. sprains, bruises and joint pain). Another must have at home.

St. John’s wort oil extract is traditionally used in herbal medicine as an antiseptic and antibacterial to help treat and heal wounds, cuts, burns and minor bruises. Restorative, it effectively calms and soothes skin.

Calendula oil extract is traditionally used in herbal medicine to help heal wounds and relieve skin inflammation and irritation. Particularly beneficial for delicate, sensitive skin, this extract is suitable for young children (2 years and older). Healing and anti-inflammatory, this is a must have at home.
Rose hip beauty oil is ideal for nourishing dry, damaged, or rosacea-prone skin, for fighting wrinkles, and for reducing stretch marks and scars.

Hazelnut beauty oil is known for its rebalancing and softening action. It soothes problematic and acne-prone skin because it deeply penetrates and leaves no greasy residue. It is particularly suitable for oily skin types because it helps re-balance PH. By rendering skin more supple and hydrated, hazelnut beauty oil prevents and helps heal stretch marks and scars.

Recognized for its anti-aging properties, Sea Buckthorn beauty oil is ideal for stimulating skin cell regeneration and for fighting signs of aging. Rich in betacarotenes, it gives a glowing complexion and is perfect for after-sun care. Its high concentration of beta-carotenes gives the oil a dark orange colour that can temporarily stain skin. It should therefore be diluted in a carrier oil before being applied to the face, body or hands.
Baobab beauty oil is recognized for its nourishing properties. Repairs and revitalizes skin, hair and nails. For all skin types.

Vetiver Bourbon essential oil is used in aromatherapy for its relaxant and sedative properties as well as for symptomatic relief of boils and acne.

Java Citronella essential oil is used in aromatherapy to help relieve joint and muscle pain associated with sprains and strains and as well as a carminative for symptomatic relief of digestive discomfort.
